posts.title: JSON Server Tutorial
posts.content: This post explains how to use JSON Server to create a fake REST API for testing and prototyping. JSON Server is a great tool for frontend developers who need to quickly set up a backend API.

posts.title: React Hooks Deep Dive
posts.content: Learn about React Hooks including useState, useEffect, useContext, and custom hooks. This comprehensive guide covers best practices and common patterns.

posts.title: Modern CSS Techniques
posts.content: Explore modern CSS features like Grid, Flexbox, CSS Variables, and more. Learn how to create responsive and maintainable stylesheets.

posts.title: API Integration Patterns
posts.content: Best practices for integrating APIs in React applications, including error handling, loading states, and data caching strategies.
